module.name: Empty Check
module.description: Check for empty or default issue descriptions

messages.closeReason:
Incomplete without a crash report ({{[minecraft|http://hopper.minecraft.net/help/finding-minecraft-data-folder]/crash-reports/crash-<DATE>-client.txt}}). Please attach it so that we can diagnose your issue.
For technical support please use the [Mojang Support Center|http://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/364794-where-can-i-find-more-help-and-technical-support-].
